EmailTemplate.name: Global_Website_HAWQ_Downloads.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for downloading HAWQ
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Here's How to Get Started. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank for downloading HAWQ for 60 days for free with your Pivotal HD Community deployment. Please refer to the documentation <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/pivotal-data-fabric/pivotal-hd#5> before you begin your install process.
As a reminder Pivotal HD Community is supported by you â€“ the Community. If you have any questions, comments, etc, please join our discussion forum <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <blog.gopivotal.com> Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node Watch now >> <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Webinar-08062013-PHD.m4v>
